channel.title: How to add starter commands etc? + Looking for coders!

item.title: How to add starter commands etc? + Looking for coders!
item.dc:creator: @masterpk3r masterpk3r
item.description:
@masterpk3r wrote:

how DO u make starter commands ive gone mad trying to answer that question myself[br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2007, 05:57:25 PM[/size][hr]how??[br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2007, 06:03:35 PM[/size][hr][quote=“masterpk3r”]how DO u make starter commands ive gone mad trying to answer that question myself[br][size=1]Posted on: May 19, 2007, 05:57:25 PM[/size][hr]how??[/quote]did u tell me yet???[br][size=1]Posted on: June 03, 2007, 03:09:53 PM[/size][hr][quote=“joshie, post:1, topic:97120”]Just opened a server;

purepkscape.no-ip.org

Looking for coders to add many things and many staff but the main question is how do i add commands like;

::starter - gives people 1m - whip, phat etc
::barrows - gives everyone barrows

Any idea how to add them?

MSN: lighterburn@gmail.com post here or pm me or add me to msn if you would like to become a coder![/quote]apperently you fuck forks and shove spoons up ur ass so why bother with u, asswipe…

Read full topic
